description1.part3: I'm fascinated by the intersection of big data and performant designs, and hope to eventually pursue a career in software development.

description2: My interests include AI/ML and cybersecurity, and I strive to incorporate these themes in my personal projects. In my spare time, I enjoy both participating in hackathons as well as tutoring others on the fundamentals of programming.
